import React, { useState } from "react"; import cn from "classnames"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import styles from "./Hero.module.sass"; import Icon from "../../../components/Icon"; import Player from "../../../components/Player"; import Modal from "../../../components/Modal"; import Connect from "../../../components/Connect"; import Bid from "../../../components/Bid"; const items = [ { title: "the creator network速", creator: "Enrico Cole", currency: "1.00 ETH", price: "$3,618.36", avatar: "/images/home/avatar-women-red.svg", image: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", image2x: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", }, { title: "Marco carrillo速", creator: "Enrico Cole", currency: "2.00 ETH", price: "$2,477.92", avatar: "/images/home/avatar-women-red.svg", image: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", image2x: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", }, { title: "the creator network速", creator: "Enrico Cole", currency: "1.00 ETH", price: "$3,618.36", avatar: "/images/home/avatar-women-red.svg", image: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", image2x: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", }, { title: "Marco carrillo速", creator: "Enrico Cole", currency: "2.00 ETH", price: "$2,477.92", avatar: "/images/home/avatar-women-red.svg", image: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", image2x: "/images/home/the-create-net-work-lg.svg", }, ]; const SlickArrow = ({ currentSlide, slideCount, children, ...props }) => ( ); const Hero = () => { const settings = { infinite: false, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, adaptiveHeight: true, nextArrow: ( ), prevArrow: ( ), }; const [visibleModalBid, setVisibleModalBid] = useState(false); return ( <>
